skins.shipDescription: F-class destroyer ©` Foxhound, Hull Number H69!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Foxhound, the F-class destroyer of the Royal Navy. Compared to my sisters, I'm the first to get special enlarged designs, so I'm a little better developed! Hehe...
skins.acquisition: Foxhound answering your call, Commander! Eh? Why don't I have nine tails? Because I'm not actually a fox... Anyways, I'll be in your care from now on!
skins.login: Commander~ Hehe, what interesting things shall we do today?
skins.details: Big sis said that... I seem to be bigger than her... What is she talking about?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I don't want to go to such a cold place...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if you want to treat me like an animal, I'm a dog, not a fox, alright? Actually, I'm just a girl!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Throw a bone at me and I'll bite you instead!
skins.secretaryTouch: Mmm... stop touching me... Your hand is so hot...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: HEY! What are you thinking? Stop touching me like that!

skins.shipDescription: I've grown so much that I can't jump like I used to... Commander, are you surprised by my post-retrofit appearance? *Giggle*
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Royal Navy F-class destroyer, Foxhound! I started in the Home Fleet, got reassigned to the Mediterranean Fleet, then the Eastern Fleet, then lastly I was sent abroad! We F-class and E-class destroyers were the first to receive an enlarged design, so we have some pretty good growth! *Giggle*~
skins.acquisition: I've grown so much that I can't jump like I used to... Commander, are you surprised by my post-retrofit appearance? *Giggle*
skins.login: Commander~! *Giggle*... *A-ahem*! Don't forget to give it your all today...
skins.details: Commander, listen to my bell~ It sounds super sweet!
skins.secretaryIdle1: It feels like you haven't patted me much since I got retrofitted... Commander, pat my head, c'mon~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: By the way, Commander, some call me "Qu'Appelle"~ What do you think? Does it sound cool?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It might be hard to quit my old habits, in spite of my growth... *Sniff sniff*
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I can help! Show me~ Hmm... change this here... and maybe here...
